001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap.cstruct;
002
003import jnr.ffi.Runtime;
004import jnr.ffi.Struct;
005
006/**
007 * JNR representation of libpcap&apos;s {@code struct bpf_program}.
008 *
009 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
010 */
011public final class BpfProgramStruct extends Struct {
012  /** Length of the compiled instruction array (in {@code struct bpf_insn}). */
013  public final Unsigned32 bf_len = new Unsigned32();
014  /** Pointer to the compiled BPF instructions. */
015  public final Pointer bf_insns = new Pointer();
016
017  /**
018   * Creates the struct bound to the supplied runtime.
019   *
020   * @param runtime JNR runtime used to allocate native memory
021   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
022   */
023  public BpfProgramStruct(Runtime runtime) {
024    super(runtime);
025  }
026}
